name: Repo Man
detailed_description:
Upcoming games from Ultimate Games S.A.

Checkout upcoming games from our Publisher - Ultimate Games S.A.:


https://store.steampowered.com/app/838630
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1024010


About the Game

The debt collection industry is waiting for you!


We employ high-class specialists whose experience guarantees high effectiveness of debts collection. We solve cases based on invoices, judgments, court orders as well as unsuccessful bailiff executions and actions of other debt collection companies.

We achieve our high effectiveness through direct visits of debt collectors throughout the country.

Choose the best orders!


You will have the opportunity to participate in debt collection from the beginning to the end. We approach each of the issues entrusted to us individually and with the use of all possible methods and developed tools, thus acting quickly and effectively.

Work for unscrupulous people.


Will you have the strength to vindicate hospital? Factory? Start with individual houses and later you will become a real debt collector. Who knows, maybe in the future you will become the best in the city.

Big business is big long!


Remember that everyone has what you want, find a way to get it. The success of the mission depends on you.

short_description: Become a debt collector. Each job is different, start from district of homes where you will learn this dangerous profession, and then take on serious orders!
supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Polish, Russian, Turkish, Italian, Spanish - Spain
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 / 8 / 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 3.2 GHz, AMD Phenom II X4 955 - 4 Core, 3.2 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon R9 280 or Nvidia GeForce GTX 660
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7 / 8 / 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-8400, AMD Ryzen 5 1600
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon RX 580 or Nvidia GeForce GTX 1060 6GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
